Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 1 of 4 -- 2.53 Mills Renewal - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 1 of 4 
(Courthouse Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy a two and fifty-three hundredths (2.53) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $113,597 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2024, with the avails and proceeds of the Tax to be used exclusively for the utility expense and building upkeep and maintenance of the East Carroll Parish Courthouse Buildings?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 2 of 4 -- 8.22 Mills Renewal - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 4 
(Library Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy an eight and twenty-two hundredths (8.22) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $369,070 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2024, with the avails and proceeds of the Tax to be used exclusively for the purpose of operating and maintaining the East Carroll Parish Library and Bookmobile?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 3 of 4 -- 2.74 Mills Renewal - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 3 of 4 
(LA Cooperative Extension Program Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy a two and seventy-four hundredths (2.74) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $123,026 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and supporting the Louisiana Cooperative Extension Program for the Parish, including providing necessary office facilities, equipment and supplies therefor, with no more than three (3) percent of the annual proceeds of the Tax to be retained by the East Carroll Police Jury for its cost of administering the Tax?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 4 of 4 -- 2 Mills - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 4 of 4
(Community Action Agency Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to levy a tax of two (2) mills (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $89,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for the entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of maintaining and operating programs in the Parish through the East Carroll Community Actions Agency?

Race.SpecificTitle: Rural Fire Protection District -- $450K Bond - PJ - 15 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall East Carroll Parish Rural Fire Protection District, State of Louisiana (the "District"), incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of not exceeding Four Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($450,000), in one or more series, to run not exceeding fifteen (15) years from date thereof, with interest at a rate not exceeding six per centum (6%) per annum, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing and improving buildings, machinery and equipment, to be used in giving fire protection to the property in the District, title to which shall be in the public; which bonds will be general obligations of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and statutory authority supplemental thereto, with an estimated 1 mill to be levied in the first year of issue to pay said Bonds?
